code: import{configureStore}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import todoReducer from'../features/Todo/todoSlice';import filterReducer from'../features/Filter/filterSlice';import{one}from'./myMiddleWare';export var store=configureStore({reducer:{todos:todoReducer,filters:filterReducer},devTools:true,middleware:function middleware(getDefaultMiddleware){return getDefaultMiddleware().concat(one);}});
